mapper.delete: DELETE FROM friends WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND friend_id = #{friendId}
mapper.select: select friend_id FROM friends WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT f.id, u.username, u.email FROM friends f JOIN user u ON f.friend_id = u.id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT f.friend_id, f.created_at, u.username, u.profile_image, COALESCE(watched_count.watched, 0) AS watched, COALESCE(comment_count.comment, 0) AS comment FROM friends f JOIN user u ON u.id = f.friend_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.user_id, COUNT(*) AS watched FROM review r GROUP BY r.user_id) AS watched_count ON watched_count.user_id = f.friend_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.user_id, COUNT(*) AS comment FROM review r WHERE r.review IS NOT NULL GROUP BY r.user_id) AS comment_count ON comment_count.user_id = f.friend_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId}
